column.name: organizer_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Organizer where name='${organizer-spartan-race}'

column.name: location_country_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Country where name='${country-germany}'

column.name: event_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Event where name='${2014-spartan-race-sprint-muenchen_name}' and start_date='${2014-spartan-race-sprint-muenchen_start_date}'

column.name: category_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Category where name='${category-hindernislauf}'

column.name: note
column.value: Zeit von Jens, da mein Zeit-Chip nicht funktioniert hat
